任.definition: to assign; to appoint; to take up a post; office; responsibility; to let; to allow; to give free rein to; no matter (how, what etc); classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

任一個.definition: any one of (a list of possibilities)

任丘市.definition: Renqiu, county-level city in Cangzhou 滄州|沧州[Cang1 zhou1], Hebei

任人唯親.definition: (idiom) to appoint people by favoritism; to practice cronyism (or nepotism)

任人唯賢.definition: to appoint people according to their merits (idiom); appointment on the basis of ability and integrity

任人宰割.definition: to get trampled on (idiom); to be taken advantage of

任便.definition: as you see fit; to do as one likes

任俠.definition: chivalrous; helping the weak for the sake of justice

任其自然.definition: to let things take their course (idiom); to leave it to nature; laissez-faire

任務.definition: mission; assignment; task; duty; role; CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]

任城.definition: Rencheng district of Jining city 濟寧市|济宁市, Shandong

任城區.definition: Rencheng district of Jining city 濟寧市|济宁市, Shandong

任安.definition: Ren An (-c. 90 BC), Han Dynasty general, also called Ren Shaoqing 任少卿

任情.definition: to let oneself go; to do as much as one pleases

任意.definition: any; arbitrary; at will; at random

任憑.definition: no matter what; despite; to allow (sb to act arbitrarily)

任憑風浪起，穩坐釣魚臺.pinyin: ren4 ping2 feng1 lang4 qi3 , wen3 zuo4 diao4 yu2 tai2
任憑風浪起，穩坐釣魚臺.definition: lit. to sit tight on the fishing terrace despite the storm (idiom); fig. to stay calm in a tense situation

任所.definition: one's office; place where one holds a post

任期.definition: term of office; CL:屆|届[jie4]; tenure (entire period in office)

任由.definition: to let (sb do sth); to allow; regardless of

任職.definition: to hold a post; to take office

任職期間.definition: term of office; while holding a post

任聽.definition: to allow (sb to act arbitrarily); to let sb have his head

任課.definition: to give classes; to work as a teacher

任賢使能.definition: to appoint the virtuous and use the able (idiom); appointment on the basis of ability and integrity

任達華.definition: Simon Yam Tat-Wah (1955-), Hong Kong actor and film producer

任選.definition: to choose freely; to pick whichever one fancies

任重而道遠.definition: see 任重道遠|任重道远[ren4zhong4-dao4yuan3]

任重道遠.definition: a heavy load and a long road; fig. to bear heavy responsibilities through a long struggle (cf Confucian Analects, 8.7)

任隨.definition: to allow (sb to have his head); to let things happen
